incidentArtifactDTO Data Type

Contains information about an incident artifact.

Namespace
(Default)
Properties
name data type type namespace min/max occurs description
actions actionInfoDTO element 0/unbounded The list of actions available to the caller for execution.
attachment attachmentDTO element 0/1 The artifact attachment (null indicates that the artifact has no attachment).
created dateTime element 0/1 The date/time the artifact was created.
creator justUserDTO element 0/1 Gets the creator of this artifact
description textContentDTO element 0/1 Gets the artifact's description.
hits threatHitDTO element 0/unbounded Read-only field containing a list of all of the threat source hits for this artifact.
id int element 0/1 The artifact ID.
inc_id int element 0/1 The incident ID.
inc_name string element 0/1 The incident name.
inc_owner objectHandle element 0/1 The incident owner.
location incidentArtifactLocationDTO element 0/1 The location of the incident artifact
parent_id int element 0/1 The parent artifact ID.
pending_sources objectHandle element 0/unbounded The IDs of any threat sources that are still in the process of being checked for this artifact.
perms incidentArtifactPermsDTO element 0/1 The current user's read/write/delete permissions are.
properties incidentArtifactPropertyDTO element 0/unbounded Additional artifact properties
relating boolean element 0/1 Whether or not this artifact should be used for relating to other incidents. Null means use the default specified by the type, true to always relate, false to never relate.
type objectHandle element 0/1 The type of the artifact. See constDTO.artifact_types for a list of all possible values.
value string element 0/1 The value of the artifact. This would be, for example, the IP address for an IP address artifact. When adding artifacts, the value can include multiple whitespace-separated values in this text field if the artifact type's is_multi_aware flag is true (see constDTO.artifact_types)
whois whoisDTO element 0/1  

Example

<incidentArtifactDTO>
  <id>...</id>
  <type>
    <id>...</id>
    <name>...</name>
  </type>
  <value>...</value>
  <description>
    <format>...</format>
    <content>...</content>
  </description>
  <creator>
    <id>...</id>
    <fname>...</fname>
    <lname>...</lname>
    <status>...</status>
    <email>...</email>
    <phone>...</phone>
    <cell>...</cell>
    <title>...</title>
    <notes>...</notes>
    <last_login>...</last_login>
    <locked>...</locked>
    <is_external>...</is_external>
  </creator>
  <hits>
    <id>...</id>
    <value>...</value>
    <threat_source_id>
      <id>...</id>
      <name>...</name>
    </threat_source_id>
    <artifact_type_id>
      <id>...</id>
      <name>...</name>
    </artifact_type_id>
    <active>...</active>
  </hits>
  <attachment>
    <id>...</id>
    <name>...</name>
    <content_type>...</content_type>
    <created>...</created>
    <creator_id>
      <id>...</id>
      <name>...</name>
    </creator_id>
    <size>...</size>
    <vers>...</vers>
    <actions>
      <id>...</id>
      <name>...</name>
      <enabled>...</enabled>
    </actions>
    <inc_id>...</inc_id>
    <inc_name>...</inc_name>
    <inc_owner>
      <id>...</id>
      <name>...</name>
    </inc_owner>
    <task_id>...</task_id>
    <task_name>...</task_name>
    <type>...</type>
  </attachment>
  <parent_id>...</parent_id>
  <inc_id>...</inc_id>
  <inc_name>...</inc_name>
  <inc_owner>
    <id>...</id>
    <name>...</name>
  </inc_owner>
  <created>...</created>
  <pending_sources>
    <id>...</id>
    <name>...</name>
  </pending_sources>
  <perms>
    <read>...</read>
    <write>...</write>
    <delete>...</delete>
  </perms>
  <properties>
    <name>...</name>
    <value>...</value>
  </properties>
  <location>
    <latlng>
      <lat>...</lat>
      <lng>...</lng>
    </latlng>
    <city>...</city>
    <state>...</state>
    <country>...</country>
    <postalCode>...</postalCode>
  </location>
  <whois>
    <raw>...</raw>
    <pending>...</pending>
    <invalid>...</invalid>
  </whois>
  <actions>
    <id>...</id>
    <name>...</name>
    <enabled>...</enabled>
  </actions>
  <relating>...</relating>
</incidentArtifactDTO>
